description:
This course is designed to get you developing faster with Sublime Text, one of today's best text editors, in minimal time. You be taught all the best tips and tricks to skip the breaking in stage of using a new editor. You will also be given resources to make your coding life easier, and to increase your development speed even more with Sublime Text.

This course is all video tutorials so you can work right along with me as I guide you through a Sublime Text workflow. Not only that, but they are downloadable so you can access them at any time!

This course will take less than two hours to complete but it will save you hundreds of development hours in the future. You can't beat that ratio!

The course is divided in to two sections, "The Basics" and "Advanced Features". All lessons are video tutorials where you can watch me work with Sublime Text.

If you have heard about Sublime Text and you have always wanted to know more about it or you are using but you aren't very familiar with all the power it can harness, then this is the course for you. Even if you do know Sublime Text very well, I'm sure there is still some useful information in this course just waiting for you to use it.
title: Sublime Text Workflow
